name: VZFileSerialPortAttachment
desc: An attachment point that writes data from the guest system to a file.

items.name: init(url: URL, append: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a file-based serial port attachment object.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of a file on the local file system.

items.name: var append: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the virtual machine appends data to the file.
